statements: SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE item_id = 1;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY quantity ASC, price DESC;
SELECT item_name, price FROM inventory WHERE price < 50;
SELECT item_id AS ID, item_name AS Name, quantity AS Qty, price AS Price FROM inventory;
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE item_id = 10
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE price > 50.00 ORDER BY item_name DESC
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE item_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND quantity BETWEEN 10 AND 20
SELECT item_name, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 5 ORDER BY price ASC, item_name
SELECT item_id, quantity FROM inventory WHERE item_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT item_name, price FROM inventory WHERE price > 50;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE contact_name IS NOT NULL ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id > 100 ORDER BY supplier_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE price BETWEEN 10 AND 50;
SELECT item_name, quantity*price AS total_value FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY total_value DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE contact_name IS NOT NULL ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, phone FROM suppliers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT item_id, item_name FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE contact_person = 'John Doe';
SELECT item_name, price FROM inventory ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, total_price FROM sales WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT item_name, price FROM inventory JOIN sales ON inventory.item_id = sales.item_id WHERE sale_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE price BETWEEN 10.00 AND 50.00;
SELECT sale_date, SUM(total_price) AS total_revenue FROM sales GROUP BY sale_date HAVING total_revenue > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 50;
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT supplier_id, name, email FROM suppliers WHERE contact_person IS NOT NULL;
SELECT sale_id, date, total_amount FROM sales ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT id, name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE price > 100
SELECT * FROM suppliers ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT products.name, suppliers.name AS supplier_name, products.price FROM products INNER JOIN suppliers ON products.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id WHERE products.category = 'Electronics'
SELECT MAX(total_amount) AS max_amount FROM sales
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY product_id ASC
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM inventory
SELECT * FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC
SELECT product_id, sale_date, total_price FROM sales WHERE quantity_sold > 10
SELECT supplier_name, contact_name, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE contact_name IS NOT NULL
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM product_categories
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE contact_name LIKE 'J%'
SELECT product_name, quantity_sold, total_price FROM inventory JOIN sales ON inventory.product_id = sales.product_id WHERE quantity_sold > 10 ORDER BY total_price DESC

SELECT category_name, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM product_categories LEFT JOIN product_supplier_mapping ON product_categories.category_id = product_supplier_mapping.product_id GROUP BY category_name
